title: Udyr
body: {{champion:77}} Just went into a custom game with no enemy or allied champions with Udyr and for some reason theres a poro next to the fountain. Anyone know why?

replies.body:
Freljoridian champions spawn a poro there when they are in a game. (pretty sure Braum's has a moustache, but not certain)

Udyr is a Freljordian champion, he sided with Sejuani in the battle for the Freljiord, and to my knowledge is the only Freljordian champ in the game to not have a slow.

Gnar is also a Freljiordian champion, however he does not spawn a Poro at the fountain, this could be because he lived in a time where the Freljiord was not icy, or because he lived in a time before Poro's had evolved. (although the most likely scenario is that riot just made a mistake)
